author: The Daily Hodl
title: Ripple President Says 2025 Will Be a Big Year for Crypto, Predicts More Spot ETFs Will Be Launched - Here's Why
text:
Ripple president Monica Long thinks additional crypto exchange-traded fund (ETF) approvals will usher in another big year for digital assets in 2025. Long predicts in a new interview with Bloomberg Crypto that “various crypto spot ETFs” will receive a seal of approval in the US this year. The Ripple president also says payments-focused altcoin XRP […]
